title: Ranked
body: So i just hit lvl 30 on my 2nd acc and am gonna start ranking it i join a ranked game and call top then idiots start locking in top for themselves saying this is ranked u dont call a lane now from my past experience playing at a plat lvl in na u call lanes or are ppl just that disoriented and stupid in oce?

replies.body: In ranked games you call a preference lane and unless your first pick you cant guarantee your going to get it and if you happen to be last pick you likely going to be support or adc but you have to deal with it
There is basically a pick order.  Not just whoever calls the lane first.
and that is why the oce ranked scene is so bad from what i have already seen

Why because there is actually some structure and not just join and spam what lane you want as fast as you can?

I've never met anyone that hasn't respected the pick order used in rank before.  If you are last in the order, tough titties.
